languages.text:
Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.
languages.original_text:
Когда пустотнорожденный персонаж применяет к союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которая не наносит урон, союзник на 1 раунд получает возможность совершить повторный бросок в случае неудачной атаки, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} характеристики или навыка с шансом успеха 20%. Этот шанс не может превышать базовый шанс успеха при броске.
Когда пустотнорожденный персонаж применяет к противнику способность, которая не наносит урон, то на 1 раунд успешные проверки уклонения и парирования этого противника с шансом 20% становятся неудачными.

traits.locale_text:
Using a non-damaging ability on an ally grants that ally the ability to reroll any failed attack, dodge, parry, characteristic, or skill test with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to reroll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to reroll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

languages.text:
Wenn du eine nicht schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auf einen Verbündeten anwendest, kann dieser Verbündete für 1 Runde einen misslungenen Angriff, eine {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweich{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}-, Eigenschafts- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} mit einer 20 %igen Erfolgschance erneut auswürfeln. Diese Chance kann nicht größer sein als die Basiserfolgschance des Wurfs.
Wenn du einen Gegner mit einer nicht schädigenden Fähigkeit angreifst, hat er für 1 Runde eine 20 %ige Chance, eine erfolgreiche Ausweich- oder Paradeprobe gegen einen beliebigen Charakter nicht zu bestehen.
languages.original_text:
Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn du eine nicht schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auf einen Verbündeten anwendest, kann dieser Verbündete für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen misslungenen Angriff, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweich-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade-{/g}, Eigenschafts- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} mit einer 20%igen Erfolgschance erneut auswürfeln. Diese Chance kann nicht größer sein als die Basiserfolgschance des Wurfs.
Wenn du einen Gegner mit einer nicht schädigenden Fähigkeit angreifst, hat er für 1 Runde eine 20%ige Chance, eine erfolgreiche Ausweich- oder Paradeprobe gegen einen beliebigen Charakter nicht zu bestehen.

languages.text:
L'utilisation d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui n'inflige pas de dégâts sur un allié permet à cet allié de relancer un jet de dés lié à une attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, une caractéristique ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence manqué, avec 20 % de chances de réussite pendant 1 round. Ces chances ne peuvent pas être supérieures aux chances de réussite de base du jet.
L'utilisation d'une capacité qui n'inflige pas de dégâts sur un ennemi lui confère 20 % de chances de réussir un test d'esquive ou de parade contre n'importe quel personnage pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text:
Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisation d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui n'inflige pas de dégâts sur un allié permet à cet allié de relancer un jet de dés lié à une attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, une caractéristique ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence manqué, avec 20 % de chances de réussite pendant 1 round. Ces chances ne peuvent pas être supérieures aux chances de réussite de base du jet.
L'utilisation d'une capacité qui n'inflige pas de dégâts sur un ennemi lui confère 20 % de chances de réussir un test d'esquive ou de parade contre n'importe quel personnage pendant 1 round.

languages.text:
当虚空之子对盟友使用非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可使该盟友获得好运效果。在一轮之内，该盟友若是攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、属性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
对敌人使用非伤害性能力之后，敌人对任何目标的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。
languages.original_text:
Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
当虚空之子对盟友使用非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可使该盟友获得好运效果。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，该盟友若是攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、属性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
对敌人使用非伤害性能力之后，敌人对任何目标的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。

当虚空之子对盟友使用非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，可使该盟友获得好运效果。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内，该盟友若是攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
对敌人使用非伤害性能力之后，敌人对任何目标的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。

languages.text:
Usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no dañina sobre un aliado le concede la capacidad de volver a tirar cualquier ataque, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de característica o de habilidad con una probabilidad de éxito del 20 % durante 1 asalto. Esta probabilidad no puede ser superior a la probabilidad de éxito básica de la tirada.
Usar una capacidad no dañina sobre un enemigo le inflige una probabilidad del 20 % de fallar una esquiva o parada aunque la tirada tenga éxito durante un asalto.
languages.original_text:
Using a non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally grants that ally the ability to re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, characteristic, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success for 1 round. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

traits.locale_text:
Usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no dañina sobre un aliado le concede la capacidad de volver a tirar cualquier ataque, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de característica o de habilidad con una probabilidad de éxito del 20 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Esta probabilidad no puede ser superior a la probabilidad de éxito básica de la tirada.
Usar una capacidad no dañina sobre un enemigo le inflige una probabilidad del 20 % de fallar una esquiva o parada aunque la tirada tenga éxito durante un asalto.

languages.text:
味方に非ダメージ系の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用時、その味方は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}/スキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}失敗時に20%の確率で再判定できるようになる。この確率は、基本成功確率以上にはならない。
敵に非ダメージ系のアビリティを使用時、その敵は1ラウンドの間、いずれかのキャラクターに対して回避、受け流しに成功しても、20%の確率で失敗扱いとなる。

Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.

敵に非ダメージ系のアビリティを使用時、その敵は1ラウンドの間、いずれかのキャラクターに対して回避、受け流しに成功しても、20%の確率で失敗扱いとなる。

味方に非ダメージ系の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用時、その味方は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}/スキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}失敗時に20%の確率で再判定できるようになる。この確率は、基本成功確率以上にはならない。
敵に非ダメージ系のアビリティを使用時、その敵は1ラウンドの間、いずれかのキャラクターに対して回避、受け流しに成功しても、20%の確率で失敗扱いとなる。

languages.text:
Bir dost birim üzerinde hasar vermeyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanmak; 1 rauntluğuna o dost birime başarısız olduğu her türlü saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}, nitelik veya yetenek {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerine{/g} %20 başarı olasılığıyla tekrar girme kabiliyeti kazandırır. Bu olasılık, atılan zarın taban başarı olasılığından daha yüksek olamaz.
Bir düşman üzerinde hasar vermeyen bir kabiliyet kullanmak, 1 rauntluğuna o düşmanın normalde başarılı olacağı bir kaçınma veya savuşturma testinde %20 olasılıkla başarısız olmasına sebep olur.
languages.original_text:

This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Using a non-damaging ability on an enemy grants them a 20% chance to fail a successful dodge or parry test against any character for 1 round.
